title.en: Falling in the Night with You

altTitles.en: Fall in the Night with You

description.en:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi’s life. The two help each other’s growth, Ren Xi’s willing to help Nyx to find her lost memories, but in the process, will discover an astonishing secret……  
  
L'apparition soudaine d'une sorcière amnésique, Nix, amène beaucoup de changements dans la vie du jeune Ren Xi. Ren Xi veut aider Nix à retrouver ses souvenirs. Cette quête leur fera découvrir un secret incroyable…

altTitles.ja: 目つき悪い子かわいい子

altTitles.en: A Cute Girl With A Nasty Look
A Cute Girl With Nasty Look

altTitles.vi: A cute girl with nasty look

description.en:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220
description.vi: Cô gái du côn này thật là ngốc nghếch và đáng yêu! Học sinh trung học Tanaka-kun tin rằng những cô gái đáng sợ như vậy thực sự rất dễ thương. Vì vậy, ngồi cạnh Mizuno-san, một người bị coi là một kẻ du côn, cậu ấy đã cố gắng làm thân với cô ấy. Tuy nhiên, ngoài biểu cảm đáng sợ, cô ấy còn có rất nhiều tin đồn !! Mặc dù ban đầu nhận được một cái nhìn lạnh lùng, nhưng sự cố gắng của Tanaka đã mở ra trái tim của Mizuno từng chút một. Nhưng kế hoạch của Tanaka để giúp cô hòa nhập với các bạn cùng lớp trong lễ hội trường đang bị đe dọa khi thảm họa ập đến!
description.es-la:
Esta delincuente es estúpida y linda!

El estudiante Tanaka-kun cree que las chicas aterradoras son en realidad lindas. Y así, sentandose al lado de la delincuente Mizuno-san intenta hacerse más cercano a ella. Además de tener una cara aterradora, ella es el sujeto de muchos rumores y temida por sus compañeros!!

Apesar de recibir la ley del hielo al principio, la ofensiva de Tanaka abre poco a poco el corazón de Mizuno-san. Pero el plan de Tanaka para ayudarla a encajar con sus compañeros durante el festival escolar, es amenazado por un ataque sin aviso!

title.en: There's Something Wrong About My Man's Morals

altTitles.en: My Lover's Personality Is a Little Strange

description.en: After a fateful encounter as children, Evonne and the outcast prince, Theo, can’t deny their deep connection. However, their lives are torn apart when Evonne’s family is wrongly accused of treason, leading to their ruin. Cursed and forced to disguise herself as a man, Evonne struggles to survive until Theo finally finds her and uses all his power as emperor to take her with him. Together, they’ll start a journey facing challenges that’ll test their love as they try to start a life together.

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

description.en:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
description.ru: У Карабоши Харуки нет ничего, что выделяло бы его из толпы, и поэтому он решил стать авантюристом, желая "отличиться". Однажды под его домом на Хоккайдо появилось подземелье. По случайному совпадению, он нашёл так называемую "панель навыков", в которой он может распределять специальные очки для увеличения скорости прокачки. Сможет ли Харуки стать популярным человеком, одержимо посещая своё "домашнее подземелье" каждый день?
description.pt-br:
Karaboshi Haruki não tem presença, tanto quanto pode ser reconhecido, então ele se tornou um aventureiro com apenas o desejo de "se destacar". Um dia, uma masmorra apareceu sob sua casa em Hokkaido. Coincidentemente, ele pegou um "Skill Board" com o qual pode gastar pontos de habilidade para aumentar sua taxa de crescimento. É possível se tornar uma pessoa popular mergulhando obsessivamente na masmorra de sua casa todos os dias?
  
Baseado no popular romance de fantasia Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer", vencedor do 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: Saegusa-san wa Megane-senpai to Koi o Egaku

altTitles.ja: 三枝さんはメガネ先輩と恋を描く

description.en: Saegusa-san is a cool lone wolf who in reality is asocial, a downer, and overall sucks at interacting with others. But she harbors a secret. She’s actually going out with her senior, referred to by everyone as Glasses-Senpai. In order to close the gap between them, every day Saegusa-san puts herself on the line (in more ways than one!) On the other hand, Glasses-Senpai is agonized over Saegusa-san's unintentional sex appeal. If he is Saegusa-san's first boyfriend, then she is his first girlfriend, and neither of them have any clue about how far they should go! Where will this romance end up?!
description.ja: クールで一匹オオカミな女の子・三枝さん。だけど本当は人と関わるのが苦手な陰キャ＆ややダウナー系な女子。そんな彼女にはある秘密が。それは先輩のメガネ先輩と付き合っていること――。彼との距離を埋めるために、今日も三枝さんは頑張って体を張る（いろんな意味で）のだが…!?一方メガネ先輩は三枝さんの無自覚SE●アピールに悶々しっぱなし。三枝さんも初彼なら、メガネ先輩も初彼女。どこまで手を出していいか分からず、戸惑うばかり!! 果たして、二人の恋の行方は――!!?

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

title.en: Asa Okitara Onnanoko ni Natteta Manga

altTitles.en: I woke up one morning as a girl Manga

altTitles.zh-hk: 早上起來變成了女孩子

altTitles.zh: 早上起来变成了女孩子

altTitles.ja: 朝起きたら女の子になってた漫画

description.en: A man wakes up one morning to find out he is now a girl - and he also now has a sister.

Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it, believe in and fight for it," Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However, after discovering a certain secret, Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?

What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

description.en:
Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"
description.es-la: Cha Iseul es una chica que nació en cuna de oro. Dedicaba sus días a entregarse a los placeres de la bebida, el sexo y el despilfarro de dinero, hasta que su madre le quitó la tarjeta de crédito y decidió no darle ni un centavo más. En plena crisis conoce a Kang Sori, una chica de cabello despeinado y aspecto pasado de moda que parece ser todo lo contrario a ella...

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

An Everyday Story of an Antique Storekeeper and an Ordinary Witch, or: Entwined Souls



This is a story about the lives of Rinnosuke and Marisa set in the future.

title.en: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: 男子だと思っていた幼馴染との新婚生活がうまくいきすぎる件について

altTitles.en: Regarding my Married Life with a Childhood Friend Whom I Thought Was a Boy Going Way Too Smoothly

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống hôn nhân của tôi và "Thằng Bạn"

description.en: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
description.ja:
親友だから、通じ合えちゃう。

高校生の秀一は、男だと思っていた幼馴染の唯華といきなり結婚することになってしまう。10年ぶりの再会に、最初はぎこちなかったが徐々に昔を思い出して――。楽しい高校生活と新婚生活を満喫しちゃう!?

意識しあっても、あと一歩が踏み出せない。
description.pt-br: Shuichi, um estudante do ensino médio, acabou se casando com seu amigo de infância que ele pensava ser um menino. Em seu reencontro após 10 anos, sua amiga de infância Yuika se transformou em uma linda garota, o que inicialmente deixou Shuichi bastante nervoso. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, ele gradualmente se acostumou com a sensação de proximidade como melhores amigos - e assim começa a história de amor deles como um casal ideal com um toque encantador de inocência!

title.en: I'll Find My Happily Ever After with the Smothering Love of the Yandere Nobleman - Anthology

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ貴公子の重すぎる愛で幸せになります！　アンソロジー

description.en: Anthology of Isekai x yandere x cinderella stories.

altTitles.ja: モブから始まる探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh-hk: 從路人開始的探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh: 从路人开始的探索英雄谭

altTitles.en: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way up From Common People

description.en:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/) 
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
description.ja: ＜ダンジョン＞にソロで潜り、スライム狩りの毎日を送る男子高校生・高木海斗。そんなある日、変なスライムから時価10億の<サーバントカード>を手に入れる。悩み抜いた末に召喚を選択した海斗のもとに現れたのは神話の戦乙女ヴァルキリーの格好をした幼女シルフィーだった。一度は落胆したものの、シルフィーが最強クラスのスキルを持っている事が判明し…!? モブな探索者から成り上がれ!
description.pt-br: Takagi Kaito, um colegial de baixa estatura, o típico personagem Mob, era um explorador comum que caçava slimes todos os dias nas masmorras que surgiram no Japão, ganhando dinheiro extra enquanto admirava sua amiga de infância, a madona da classe. Um belo dia, um slime dourado que ele nunca tinha visto antes aparece para ele. Depois de derrotá-lo, ele obtém um item extremamente raro no valor de centenas de milhões, uma carta de Servo que pode convocar seres lendários!! Depois que ele se decide, ele a convoca, e uma donzela guerreira extremamente linda aparece. Supere sua posição como um simples Mob, Kaito! Uma nova fantasia moderna começa!

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

title.en: There Are No Bad Heroes in This World

description.en:
Choi Hyun-seok, who was once the mightiest man, begins a new life as a hero in another world after his death. 

"A hero who monopolizes wealth, fame, and beautiful women!" 

Dreaming of a glorious future, he arrives in the other world, only to encounter a monstrous beast with a head one size larger than his own. 

The monster, a high-ranking officer of the Demon King’s army, asked: "Hero? Are you the so-called hero?" 

"Uh… I guess I’m the hero…?"

And so, hell began.
description.ko:
세상에서 가장 강한 남자라 불렸던 사나이.세계 최대 격투기 리그의 헤비급 챔피언.최강의 남자였던 최현석은 죽음 이후 이세계의 용사로서 새로운 삶을 시작한다.

'부! 명예! 미녀를 독차지하는 용사!'

찬란한 미래를 꿈꾸며 이세계로 이동한 그가 조우한 것은 자신보다 머리 하나는 더 큰 근육질의 소대가리를 괴물.마왕군의 간부였던 괴물이 물었다.

"용사? 네가 용사라는 거냐?"
“어... 용사일걸요...?”

그렇게 지옥이 시작됐다.

description.en: It’s the last day of the year, and both Mokou and Keine plan to run some errands and meet up later. But of course it ends up being harder than it sounds.

Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.en: The Masters Are Watching Over Me
The Masters Are Subscribing to Me

description.en: “Cheong-un, parry the attack! Move faster or the obstacle course will kill you!” The progenitors of the great Wudang sect and the mighty Shaolin encounter post-ascension issues when they find themselves reduced to servants in the godly realm. Their only hope and escape from their divine chores lie in the hands of less-than-average Cheong-un, who can hardly beat his peers in the sect. Can the masters raise an average boy into a master of martial arts and finally relieve themselves of their menial chores?

altTitles.th: คุณครูพันธุ์หายาก

description.en:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**
description.ru:
22-летний Эйкити Онидзука — бестолочь, бывший член банды... и учитель?
Великий учитель Онидзука вытворяет невозможные, иногда нелепые выходки, пытаясь перехитрить и победить класс 3-4, который намерен выдворить его из школы. В то же время другие препятствия представлены во всей красе, включая лысеющего заместителя директора Хироси Утиямаду, старых врагов со времён его принадлежности к банде и его собственных идиотских методов преподавания. Всё это встаёт на пути у Онидзуки, когда тот пытается помочь ученикам самого проблемного класса школы Сэйрин и своей прекрасной коллеге Адзусе Фуюцуки.

---

(source: shikimori)
description.tr:
Eikichi Onizuka ile tanışın, 22 yaşında eski bir motorcu. Kaba, ağzı bozuk ve anlık öfkesi var. Beklenmedik hedefi: Dünyanın En İyi Lise Öğretmeni olmak! Tabii ki öğretmen olmak istemesinin tek nedeni, seksi öğrencilerle birlikte olabilmek...
Tam bir eğitmen olmadan önce, diplomasını kazanmak için öğrenci öğretmen olarak çalışması gerekmektedir. Onizuka kampüsteki en sert adamın kendisi olduğunu düşünebilir ama zorbalar, şantajcılar ve entrikacı sadistlerle dolu sınıfıyla karşılaştığında bunu kanıtlamak zorunda kalacaktır.
description.uk: Ця історія про те, як колишній член банди «Онібаку» Онідзука Ейкічі, який присвятив усю юність бійкам та розвагам, вирішив стати найкрутішим учителем.
description.vi:
Great Teacher Onizuka, còn được biết đến với tên viết tắt GTO, là câu chuyện về Eikichi Onizuka, 1 cựu gangster nổi tiếng ở Shonan – một thành phố ở Tokyo. Onizuka là người nóng nảy, thô lỗ, và gở miệng. Thế nhưng anh ta có một mong muốn độc nhất vô nhị: muốn trở thành một người đàn ông vĩ đại và vì vậy anh ấy đã làm thầy giáo – một thầy giáo vĩ đại nhất thế giới, vì một lý do cực kì đơn giản: ước mơ 40C16 (40 cưới 16).
Trước khi Onizuka được công nhận là một giáo viên chính thức, anh sẽ phải làm chủ nhiệm một lớp để thử việc. Onizuka có thể là một tay cứng cựa trên đường phố, nhưng khi được giao vào một lớp đủ mọi thành phần du côn, chơi đểu, và hâm hấp, anh sẽ phải tự chứng tỏ bản thân mình trước lũ học trò nghịch còn hơn quỷ.

title.en: The Delivery Man From Martial World

description.en: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)
description.fr:
Alors qu’il étudiait assidument les arts martiaux, Woosung a vu son maître périr sous ses yeux, condamné par jalousie et injustice. Lorsqu’il le suit à son tour dans la mort, il fait une promesse : celle de se venger coûte que coûte ! Et cette vengeance arrivera peut-être plus tôt qu’il ne l’imagine... car Woosung vient de se réincarner dans le corps d’un candidat à l’école des démons célestes. Un entraînement terrible l’attend, où seuls les prétendants les plus déterminés survivront. A la clé ? La maîtrise des arts démoniaques ! Seront-ils les armes de la vengeance de Woosung ? 

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)
description.ja:
「もしもう一度、生きることを許されたら…あいつだけは必ず殺します！」 禁止された魔功を会得したという汚名を着せられ殺された、槍尊門の継承者 赫 運星。 死ぬ間際にそう願うと、槍尊門の神物の力により、転生する。 彼の目的はただ一つ、正派の偽善者どもへの復讐！ 「師父よ…あの世で待っていてください！」

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)
description.ko:
‘평생 협의를 외치셨던 분이 이리 가셨습니까…!'

금지된 마공을 익혔다는 누명을 쓰고 죽임 당한
창존문의 계승자와 제자 혁운성.

정파의 위선자들에 의한 비참하고 억울한 죽음…  

운성이 죽음을 맞이하는 순간, 
창존문의 신물이 빛을 발하며 새로운 인생이 주어진다. 

바로, 마교 수련생 구백 호로서의 인생이! 

정파와 마교, 두 개의 정체성.
그러나 목표는 하나, 복수뿐! 

운명을 받아들이고 원한을 되씹으며 운성은 무공을 쌓고
그렇게 복수의 시간도 차츰 다가오는데….


마교를 장악하고 정파의 위선자들을 처단하라!
생사를 건 난관 속에 성장하는 구백 호 운성의 복수 활극! 

일황 작가의 인기 무협 소설 <신마경천기>의 웹툰화.

description.ru:
«Лишь твои поступки поддерживают гармонию в жизни… Именно на это ты должен опираться!..» Преемник секты Искусного Копья и его ученик Хёк Ун-Сон были застигнуты за изучением запретного Демонического искусства и в последствии были наказаны смертью. «Жалкие лицемеры, опирающиеся на устои своей секты!..» Но в момент, когда Хёк Ун-Сон предстал перед вратами в ад, артефакт секты Искусного Копья стал излучать странный свет, одаривший юношу новой жизнью. Две противоположности: секта, исповедующая лишь добро, и секта, погрязшая в изучении демонических техник. Приняв свою судьбу и вспоминая всю ту злобу, что накопилась в нём, Ун-Сон начинает свой путь к становлению боевым мастером, чтобы потом отомстить… Отомстить ублюдкам, что предали его! История о жизни и смерти, о добре и зле, о случайных встречах и удаче… Начинается!

著名神秘门派,创尊门
虽然师徒都为正派的侠客献身了
但留下的只有冤屈和冤死!

最后的瞬间，神物闪现

颤栗吧，紧张吧！

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.ja:
「オレはただ…静かに過ごしたいだけなのに――…」

両親の転勤のおかげで念願の一人暮らしをはじめた高校生・陽高旭。孤独を愛する彼は学校でもトイレで一人ぼっちメシをキメていた。しかし、ささやかな平穏はひとりの少女…月峰千夜によって破られる。どこからともなく旭の元へ現れる千夜は彼の気弱さにつけこみ無茶を要求してきて!?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

title.en: Snake Immortal: The Tale of a Snake's Cultivation to Immortality

altTitles.en: Tale of the Old Snake's Immortal Cultivation

description.en:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title.en: Menhera Usagi wa Yandere Ookami ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

title.en: After Being Reborn I Was Surrounded by Enemy Cubs

altTitles.zh: 重生后身边全是仇人幼崽

description.en:
After a miscalculation, Princess Stephanie, who holds supreme power in the empire, dies mysteriously on the eve of her coronation as Queen.
Stephanie opens her eyes filled with endless doubts and anger, only to find herself reborn in a small border town in the Aiello Empire. She thought she would be far away from the political center, but soon realizes that the people around her are all familiar... cubs (children)?!
From their conversations, she learns that her enemies have thrived after her death and become powerful bosses. What should she do now?
"After Rebirth, I'm Surrounded by Enemy Cubs."

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,
아우터와의 싸움을 승리로 끝낼 수 있을까?

description.pt-br:
“Talvez os Deuses Internos nunca possam derrotar os Deuses Exteriores…”, pensou Yuwon Kim, um guerreiro corajoso e de alto escalão, após uma derrota amarga.

Mas Yuwon é tenaz demais para desistir. Sua perda se torna o início de uma nova jornada como repatriado. Com determinação renovada, Yuwon recomeça de onde começou, destruindo monstro após monstro e reaprendendo suas habilidades antes de enfrentar a Torre mais uma vez.

Mas ele conseguirá abrir caminho através dos tutoriais e subir de nível mais uma vez, ou sua conquista desmoronará diante dele?

description.ar:
هنا ، داخل رواية فنون الدفاع عن النفس هذه ، يوجد معلم حقيقي يعلم البطل المتعجرف وينقذه من الموت.
 وسيم وطيب وصالح وقوي و ...
 على أي حال ، كان هناك عيب كبير في معلم البطل وهو ابنته الوحيدة الحمقاء المليئة بالجشع... كانت شريرة اضافية ، كانت تطارد البطل دوما ولكنه لم يستطع التخلي عنها لانها ابنه معلمه.
 خلال قراءة الرواية ، قمت بلعن تلك الابنة وقلت أنه لو كنت أنا ، فلن أعيش هكذا.
 "لكن هذا لا يعني أنني أريد أن أكون هي!"
 ما هو أسوأ ان أبي مات بالفعل ، وسمعتي هي الأسوأ.
 هربت حتما ، لكن ... مت، لكن عندما فتحت عيني كان أبي حياً؟!
 "إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، في هذه الحياة ، سانقذ أبي بالتأكيد!"
 لكن…
 "أعتقد أنهم يستهدفون حفيدتي !؟ سأقتلهم جميعًا! "
 لماذا أرى جدي ، الذي لم يظهر سوى مرات قليلة في الرواية يتصرف هكذا؟
 "زواج؟ لا ، قالت يوني إنها ستعيش بجانبي لبقية حياتها ".
 حتى أبي ، بطريقة ما أصبح غريبًا.
 علاوة على ذلك،
 "لماذا تستمر في تفاديني؟ هل هذا خطأي أيضًا؟ "
 أليست الشخصية الرئيسية فجأة مهووسة بي؟
 في الأصل ، كان مقدرا لي أن أموت حتى أتيت إلى هنا ".
 لقد أنقذت ذلك الوغد ، لكن اليس العمل الصالح دوما يمر دون عقاب؟
 "على الأقل عندما أكون أمامك ... لا أعتقد أنني شخص رائع."
 الشرير الذي قطع عنقي يحاول فجأة التوبة.
 هل من المقبول حقًا أن يصبح الأمر هكذا؟

---

description.en:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/56272329)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%84%B8%EA%B0%80-%EC%B2%9C%EB%8C%80%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EC%86%90%EB%85%80-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3263), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61001975)

description.es:
¡La protagonista transmigró a un mundo de una novela de artes marciales! La protagonista transmigra al cuerpo de Baeklee Yeon, la tonta y detestable hija de Baeklee Ee-Gang, un ser perfecto y el maestro del protagonista masculino, quien lo guía hacia el camino de un héroe. Ella fue asesinada inesperadamente, pero cuando abrió los ojos descubrió que había regresado a su infancia donde podría enmendar todos sus errores. “¿Podré ser amada esta vez?” En esta vida, con la determinación de convertirse en la hija perfecta, en lugar de un fastidio, ella pasa de ser la nieta despreciada a la nieta amada de la familia Baeklee. “¡¿Crees que lo vales?!” “¡Sí!” Incapaz de ocultar su confusión ante el vigor de su ambiciosa nieta… “Si hay incluso una pequeña esperanza, ¿Cómo puedo, como padre, rendirme?” “…Es como hablarle a la pared.” Su abuelo secretamente abre su corazón después de ser arrollado por el dúo de atractivos padre e hija, resueltos a salvar a la incapacitada hija que no puede practicar artes marciales, aunque eso significara recibir su odio. ¡Y justo cuando su vida merecía ser vivida, ¿la obsesión de los candidatos a protagonistas masculinos hacia ella, empezó de repente?! ¡Yeon, sólo caminemos por el sendero de flores de ahora en adelante!

---
Aquí, dentro de esta novela de artes marciales, hay un verdadero maestro que enseña al arrogante protagonista masculino y lo despierta a través de la muerte. Guapo, bondadoso, recto, fuerte y... De todos modos, había un gran defecto en el excelente profesor del protagonista masculino. Era su tonta única hija la que estaba llena de codicia. Una villana extra tenaz, que siempre regresa para perseguir al protagonista masculino en todos los sentidos, pero no puede ser abandonada porque es la hija de su maestro. Mientras leía la novela, maldije a esa hija. Diciendo que si fuera yo, no viviría así. '¡Pero eso no significaba que yo quisiera ser ella!' Lo que era peor, Padre ya murió, y mi reputación es la peor. Inevitablemente, me escapé, pero... morí. Sin embargo, cuando abrí los ojos, ¿¡Padre estaba vivo!? '¡Si es así, en esta vida, definitivamente salvaré a Padre!' Sin embargo… “¿¡Pensar que están apuntando a mi nieta!? ¡Los mataré a todos!” ¿Por qué veo al abuelo, que ni siquiera aparece muchas veces a lo largo de la novela, tan a menudo así? "¿Casamiento? No. Yeonie dijo que viviría a mi lado por el resto de su vida”. Incluso Padre, de alguna manera se volvió raro. Además, “¿Por qué sigues evitándome? ¿Es este también mi error? ¿No se está obsesionando el personaje principal de repente conmigo? “Originalmente, estaba destinado a morir. Hasta que llegaste aquí. Salvé al bastardo de tiempo limitado, pero ¿no es que ninguna buena acción queda sin castigo? "Al menos cuando estoy frente a ti... no creo que sea una basura". El villano que me voló el cuello de repente está tratando de arrepentirse. ¿Está realmente bien si es así?

---

description.fr:
Dans ce roman d'arts martiaux, il y a un professeur qui enseigne à l’arrogant protagoniste et le sauve de la mort. Une belle apparence, intelligent, fort… Quoi qu'il en soit, ce professeur avait un point faible. Il s'agit de sa fille unique, stupide et remplie de cupidité. Une antagoniste tenace, qui ne fait qu’embêter le rôle principal masculin de toutes sortes de manières, mais ne peut être abandonnée car elle est la fille de son professeur. Tout au long de la lecture du roman, j'ai maudit cette fille. Dire que si c'était moi, je ne vivrais pas comme ça.

«Mais ça ne voulait pas dire que je voulais être elle!»

Et le pire arriva, la mort de mon père. Évidemment, je me suis enfuie, mais… J'ai été assassinée. Puis, quand j'ai ouvert les yeux, Père était en vie?!

«Cette fois-ci, dans cette vie, je sauverai père!»

Cependant…

«Comment osent-ils s'en prendre à ma petite-fille?! Je vais tous les tuer!»

Pourquoi est-ce que je croise grand-père, qui n'apparaît pas souvent dans le roman, aussi fréquemment?

«Un mariage? Non. Yeonie a dit qu'elle vivrait à mes côtés pour le restant de sa vie.»

Même Père, d'une manière ou d'une autre, est devenu bizarre.

De plus, «Pourquoi continuez-vous à m'éviter? Ai-je fait une erreur?»

Le personnage principal n'est-il pas soudainement en train de devenir obsédé par moi?

«À l'origine, j'étais destiné à mourir. Jusqu'à ce que tu viennes ici.»

J'ai sauvé ce bâtard limité dans le temps, mais n'est-ce pas qu'aucune bonne action ne reste impunie?

«Au moins quand je suis devant toi… je ne me sens pas comme une ordure.»

Le méchant qui m'a tuée essaie soudainement de se repentir.

Est-ce une bonne chose?

---

description.ru:
Здесь, внутри этого романа о боевых искусствах, есть учитель, который учит надменного мужского героя и пробуждает его силу. Красивый, добродушный, праведный, сильный и… К сожалению, у чертовски прекрасного учителя главного героя был один большой недостаток. Это была его глупая дочь, вдоволь наполненная жадностью. Стойкая статистка-злодейка, которая всегда возвращается, чтобы преследовать главного героя, но ее нельзя бросить, потому что она дочь учителя. На протяжении всего романа я проклинала эту дочь. Сказать честно, что если бы этой дочерью была я, то не допустила бы подобного. 

—Но это не значит, что я хотела быть ею!

Что еще хуже, отец уже умер, а моя репутация была ужасной. 

Я сбежала, но… я умерла. Однако, когда я открыл глаза, отец все ещё был жив!?

«Если так, то в этой жизни я обязательно спасу отца!»

Однако…

—Подумать только, они целятся в мою внучку!? Я убью их всех!

Почему я так часто вижу дедушку, который появлялся в романе от силы пару раз? 

—Брак? Нет. Ёни сказала, что будет жить рядом со мной до конца своей жизни. 

Даже отец стал вести себя как-то странно.

Более того:
—Почему ты продолжаешь меня избегать? Это тоже моя ошибка?

Почему главной герой внезапно стал так одержим мной? 

—До твоего прихода мне было суждено умереть

Я спасла временного ублюдка, но ведь ни одно доброе дело не остается безнаказанным?

—По крайней мере, когда я стою перед тобой…

Злодей, снесший мне шею, вдруг пытается раскаяться.

Все будет хорошо, так ведь?

---

description.tr:
Ana karakter; dövüş sanatları dünyasında başrolü, hikâyenin kahramanı yapacak olan güçlü ve eğitimini tamamlamış usta Baek Lee Ee-Gang’ın aptal ve sinir bozucu kızı Baek Lee Yeon olarak hayat bulur. Yeon, beklenmedik şekilde öldürülür ve gözlerini açtığında her şeyi geri alabileceği çocukluk günlerine geri döner. “Bu hayatımda ailem beni sevecek mi?” Baş belası olmak yerine harika bir evlat olmaya karar veren Yeon, Baek Lee ailesinin saygın torunu olarak hayatına başlar. Bu hayatını güzelce yaşamak ister ancak ailenin başı olan büyükbabası Baek Lee Pan-Hyuk da dahil olmak üzere herkes Yeon’a engel olur. Büyükbabasının bakışları o kadar serttir ki dağları ve nehirleri bile titretebilir. “O kadar değerli olduğunu mu sanıyorsun?”
“Evet.”
Büyükbaba, kendine güvenen torunu karşısında şaşkına döner ve oğluyla torununu gizlice izlemeye başlar.
“Çok az umut olsa da baba olarak nasıl hemen pes edebilirsin?”
“Amma inatçısın he.”
Yakışıklı oğlu, dövüş sanatları dünyasının yüz karası kızını o karanlıktan kurtarmaya ve herkesi karşısına almaya hazırdır. Yeon, tam hayatının artık daha güzel olacağını düşünürken erkek başroller bir bir ona takıntılı olmaya başlar!
“Yeonie’m, bu sefer hayatımız gerçekten çok güzel olacak!!”

description.vi:
Cô xuyên không trở thành một nhân vật chính trong thế giới võ lâm. Cô trở thành BaekRi Yeon, đứa con gái ngốc nghếch và quậy phá của BaekRi Eui Kang, một người thầy chân chính và là người đã dẫn dắt nhân vật nam chính trở thành một anh hùng. Sau khi bất ngờ bị giết, cô mở mắt ra và trở thành một đứa trẻ có thể làm đảo ngược mọi thứ. ‘Mình, lần này có thể nhận được sự yêu thương không?” Ở kiếp này, cô có niềm tin rằng mình sẽ trở thành con gái được yêu thương chứ không phải đứa con gái chịu nhiều tổn thương nữa, cô bắt đầu cuộc sống được mọi người kính trọng từ cháu gái của gia đình Baekri. Những gia tộc cản trở xuất hiện trước mặt Yeon, người chỉ muốn đi trên con đường rải đẩy hoa, và Baek Ri Pae-hyeok, là tộc trưởng và cũng là ông nội của cô, ông sở hữu khí phách của một vị vua, người có thể khiến cả núi sông và cây cối rung chuyển chỉ bằng một ánh mắt. “Ngươi cho rằng ngươi đáng giá như thế sao!” “Vâng!” Ông không thể che giấu sự hốt hoảng trước khí thế mạnh mẽ của cháu gái “Nếu còn một tia hy vọng mong manh, người làm cha sao con có thể từ bỏ?” “…Như là một đứa trẻ cứng đầu.” Ông lão bắt đầu mềm lòng vì hai cha con tuyệt mỹ đánh bại với quyết tâm sẽ cứu đứa cháu gái không có tài nghệ võ công … Tôi nghĩ rằng được sống ở thời điểm này là xứng đáng, nhưng nỗi ám ảnh của các ứng cử viên nam chính đột nhiên bắt đầu? Yeoni của chúng ta, bây giờ hãy chỉ đi trên con đường hoa thôi nhé!

---

description.pt-br:
Aqui, dentro desta novel de artes marciais, há um professor que ensina o protagonista arrogante e o desperta através de sua morte. Bonito, agradável, justo, forte e… enfim, só havia uma grande falha no professor do protagonista, que era sua filha única insensata, a qual era cheia de ambição. Uma persistente vilã extra que sempre assombra o protagonista de todas as formas, mas nunca pode ser abandonada por ser a filha do professor. Enquanto eu lia o romance, amaldiçoei-a, dizendo que, se eu fosse ela, não viveria daquela forma. Mas isso não significava que eu queria ser ela! Pior ainda, o pai já havia morrido e minha reputação era a pior. Inevitavelmente, eu fugi, mas… morri. No entanto, quando abri meus olhos, meu pai estava vivo?! “Já que é assim, nesta vida, vou definitivamente salvar meu pai! Entretanto… “Eles estão visando minha neta?! Vou matar todos eles” Por que vejo o meu avô, que sequer aparece muitas vezes na novel, com tanta frequência assim? “Casamento? Não. Yeon disse que viveria ao meu lado pelo resto da vida dela.” Mesmo meu pai se tornou estranho. Além disso, “Por que você continua me evitando? Cometi algum erro?”, o protagonista por um acaso está se tornando obcecado por mim? “Originalmente, eu estava destinado à morte. Até você chegar aqui.” Eu salvei o idiota que tinha os dias contados, mas não dizem que somos recompensados por nossas boas ações? “Pelo menos, quando estou à sua frente… não penso que sou um lix@.” De repente, o vilão responsável por minha morte está parecendo arrependido. Está mesmo tudo bem que as coisas sejam assim?

title.en: The Holy Emperor's Grandson Is a Necromancer

description.en: Our MC dies from an accidental electrocution and ends up inhabiting the body of a young prince in another world, his new profession being the Necromancer he chose in the game he was playing before his untimely demise. However, things are not what they seem – including his own Necromancy skills!

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by her maternal grandfather, is reborn with memories of her past life. Faced with the same fate, she seeks out her estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, she is instead met with love and acceptance from her father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers her the family leadership.

altTitles.en: A Poison Master in the Sichuan Tang Clan
The Poison Master of Sacheon Tang Clan

description.en:
Spicy Fabre, a million-streamer known for his expertise in poisons and venomous insects, was bitten by a black mamba during a local shoot in Africa and subsequently reincarnated in the world of Murim.

Now in a jungle raising poisonous insects, the streamer has caught the attention of the Sichuan Tang Clan, renowned for its mastery of poison arts, who wants him.

"Join us and become a member."

An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.
description.ja: 令和を象徴するテーマを扱った、極上の現代オムニバスホラー。あなたの身に起こるかもしれない“怖れ”。そんな日常で感じる恐怖や不安は、今日から更に増殖していく――。

title.en: The Hero Became the Duke's Eldest Son

description.en:
Aden Albireo, the "Dragon Slayer King", was a hero who saved the world by eliminating the Berserker and the Underlord. However, he was betrayed by those who whispered friendship to him, and met his death...

"I didn't know I would be resurrected like this?!"

15 years before the Underlord's resurrection, 'Aden Albireo' reincarnated into the body of the eldest son of a unheard-of duke's family, 'Aden Remes'! And...

"It's been a while, Dragon Slayer King!"

"The Underlord I thought I had defeated is inside my soul?!"

Will Aden be able to end his uncomfortable cohabitation(?) with the Underlord and prevent his resurrection?
description.ko:
아덴 알비레오, 그는 광룡과 지하 군주, 언더로드를 없애고 세상을 구한 영웅, "용살왕"이라 불렸다. 그러나 우정을 속삭였던 이들에게 배신당해, 죽음을 맞게 되는데...

"이런 식으로 되살아날 줄은 몰랐는데?"

언더로드 부활 15년 전, 듣도 보도 못한 공작가의 망나니 장남, '아덴 레메스'의 몸으로 회귀한 '아덴 알비레오'! 게다가…

"오랜만이구나, 용살왕이여!"

해치운 줄 알았던 언더로드가 내 영혼 안에 있다고?!

과연 아덴은 언더로드와의 불편한 동거(?)를 끝내고 그의 부활을 막아낼 수 있을 것인가!

altTitles.es-la: Mis alter egos son seres trascendentales

altTitles.en: All My Alter Egos Are Tycoons
My Alter Ego's Path to Greatness

description.en:
Seonghyeon Han is a victim of a violent crime that left him with impaired legs and a fear of the outside world. Now, he faces an even greater challenge: while he gained the power to create clones, he has just 24 hours before being sent to another dimension.

As the countdown ticks down, Seonghyeon makes a desperate move -- he sends his clone through the interdimensional portal, and discovers his real body can remain safe at home.

Thus begins the epic tale of Seonghyeon's... clones.
description.ko:
대륙의 공포- 불사왕이 절망을 불러오고, 신의 뜻을 받드는 빛의 기사가 이에 맞선다.
혼란의 시대에 준동하는 수많은 영웅들.

그리고 갑작스레 지구에 등장한 정체불명의 강자들까지!

그런데,
그게 전부 나였다.
…정확히는 이세계에 보냈던 내 분신들이었다.

description.en: Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…
